name: USC Application Project
description:
This is a little build showcasing my skills creating assets such as animated sprites and backgrounds.  I created everything in this demo, including the original soundtrack and all the sound effects.  I wanted this to feel like an atmospheric showcase, to demonstrate what I can do, and because I really like games that slow down and let the player appreciate the surroundings.  The objective is to get all the golden apples (there are 20).  

Remember that you can double jump!  Otherwise the controls are  WASD or arrow keys and the space bar.  Press esc to quit.
